title: Fearless
description: Whole once again and finally with the man she loves Bree has only one thing on her mind...Revenge. And she’ll take get it any way she can. But the news of her continued existence has reached the ears of her enemies, and while Gabriel is busy arranging his retirement as an assassin Bree has joined forces with Brad to kick Antonio where it hurts.With Gabriel constantly away and a huge contract on her head that just keeps getting bigger and bigger with every move she makes, can Bree survive long enough to finally punish those that made her existence so painful? Or will the assassin that is stalking her every move be the one to finally take her down for good?Join Bree and Gabriel in the final instalment of the Fangless Trilogy, where all Bree’s secrets finally come to light.
author: E.M. Reders
